pr_title: Switch back to platform class loader for plugins

timeline.bodyText: Can you add an explanation to the commit message? This is lacking context.
timeline.author: martint

timeline.message:
Switch back to platform class loader for plugins

This is the defined API on Java 9+ to access all of the classes that
are part of the Java platform. It is the replacement for the previous
and now removed extension mechanism.

Switch back to platform class loader for plugins

This is the defined API on Java 9+ to access all of the classes that
are part of the Java platform. It is the replacement for the previous
and now removed extension mechanism.
